reliquary:BlastOff.NAME: Despegue!
reliquary:BlastOff.DESCRIPTION: Haz !D! de daño y aplica !M! Vulnerable a TODOS los enemigos. NL .
reliquary:BlastOff.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: The card name is the culmination of a rocket launch countdown: 3, 2, 1, blast off!

reliquary:Pearlescence.NAME: Nacarado
reliquary:Pearlescence.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: The description should match the translation of the pearlescence keyword. (Test it. Is accord the keyword that i put in Spanish)

reliquary:VaporAmbrosia.NAME: Vapor Ambrosía
reliquary:VaporAmbrosia.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Gana !M! Mantra. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporAmbrosia.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: Each of these 'Vapor' cards corresponds to one of the 42 potions in the game.

reliquary:VaporAncientPotion.NAME: Vapor Antiguo
reliquary:VaporAncientPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Quita 1 Artefacto del enemigo. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporAncientPotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Quita 1 Artefacto de TODOS los enemigos. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporAttackPotion.NAME: Vapor Enloquecedor
reliquary:VaporAttackPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Añade una carta de ataque aleatoria a tu mano. Cuesta 0 este turno. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporAttackPotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Añade !M! copias de un ataque aleatorio a tu mano. Cuestan 0 este turno. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporBlessingOfTheForge.NAME: Vapor de Enfriamiento
reliquary:VaporBlessingOfTheForge.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Mejora una carta aleatoria en tu mano por el resto del combate. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporBlessingOfTheForge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Mejora la mitad de las cartas de tu mano durante el resto del combate, redondeando hacia arriba, al azar. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporBlockPotion.NAME: Vapor envolvente
reliquary:VaporBlockPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Gana !B! Bloqueo. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporBloodPotion.NAME: Vapor de sangre
reliquary:VaporBloodPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Cura el !M! % de tus NL PV Maximos. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporBottledMiracle.NAME: Vapor Milagroso
reliquary:VaporBottledMiracle.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Añade un *Milagro a tu mano. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporBottledMiracle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Añade un *Milagro+ a tu mano. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporColorlessPotion.NAME: Vapor Transparente
reliquary:VaporColorlessPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Añade una carta Incolora a tu mano. Cuesta 0 este turno. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporColorlessPotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Añade !M! copias de una carta incolora a tu mano. Cuestan 0 este turno. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporCultistPotion.NAME: Vapor Ritual
reliquary:VaporCultistPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Gana 1 Ritual y Pierde !M! Strength.

reliquary:VaporCunningPotion.NAME: Vapor Engañoso
reliquary:VaporCunningPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Añade una *Navaja+ a tu mano. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporCunningPotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Añade !M! *Navaja+ a tu mano. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporDistilledChaos.NAME: Vapor Caótico
reliquary:VaporDistilledChaos.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Juega la primera carta de tu pila de robado. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporDistilledChaos.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Juega las !M! primeras cartas de tu pila de robado. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporDuplicationPotion.NAME: Vapor Vaporoso
reliquary:VaporDuplicationPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Este turno, tu siguiente carta de coste 0 o 1 se juega 2 veces. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporDuplicationPotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Este turno, tus !M! siguientes cartas de cost 0 o 1 se juegan 2 veces. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporElixir.NAME: Vapor Limpiador
reliquary:VaporElixir.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Agota una carta de estado o Maldicion en tu mano aleatoriamente. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporElixir.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Agota todas las cartas de estado y maldicion en tu mano. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporEntropicBrew.NAME: Vapor Entrópico
reliquary:VaporEntropicBrew.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Una de tus pociones se convierte en una nueva pocion aleatoriamente. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporEntropicBrew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Tus pociones se convierten en una nueva pocion aleatoriamente. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporEssenceOfDarkness.NAME: Vapor Oscuro
reliquary:VaporEssenceOfDarkness.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Activa la habilidad pasiva de todos tus orbes de oscuridad. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporEssenceOfDarkness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Activa la habilidad pasiva de todos tur orbes de oscuridad !M! veces. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporEssenceOfSteel.NAME: Vapor de Acero
reliquary:VaporEssenceOfSteel.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Gana !M! Armadura de Placas.

reliquary:VaporExplosivePotion.NAME: Vapor Explosivo
reliquary:VaporExplosivePotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Haz !D! de daño a TODOS los enemigos. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporFairyInABottle.NAME: Vapor Aislante
reliquary:VaporFairyInABottle.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Previene la proxima vez que vayas a perder PV. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporFairyInABottle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Previene las proximas !M! veces que vayas a perder PV. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporFearPotion.NAME: Vapor Amenazador
reliquary:VaporFearPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Aplica !M! Vulnerable. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporFirePotion.NAME: Vapor Ardiente
reliquary:VaporFirePotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Haz !D! de daño. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporFlexPotion.NAME: Vapor Beefy
reliquary:VaporFlexPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Gana !M! de Fuerza. NL Al final del turno, pierde !M! Fuerza. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporFocusPotion.NAME: Vapor Concentrado
reliquary:VaporFocusPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Gana !M! Concentracion. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporFruitJuice.NAME: Vapor Frutal
reliquary:VaporFruitJuice.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Gana !M! PV Maximos. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporGamblersBrew.NAME: Vapor Cambiante
reliquary:VaporGamblersBrew.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Descarta 1 carta al azar, luego roba 1 carta. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporGamblersBrew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Descarta tu mano, luego roba la misma cantidad de cartas. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporGhostInAJar.NAME: Vapor Fantasmal
reliquary:VaporGhostInAJar.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Tienes !M! % de probabilidad de aplicar 1 Intangible. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporLiquidMemories.NAME: Vapor Deja
reliquary:VaporLiquidMemories.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Devuelve una carta aleatoria de tu pila de descartes a tu mano. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporLiquidMemories.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Devuelve !M! cartas aleatorias de tu pila de descartes a tu mano. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporPoisonPotion.NAME: Vapor Venenoso
reliquary:VaporPoisonPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Aplica !M! Veneno. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporPotionOfCapacity.NAME: Vapor Ondulante
reliquary:VaporPotionOfCapacity.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Gana 1 espacio de Orbe.
reliquary:VaporPotionOfCapacity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Gana !M! espacios de Orbe.

reliquary:VaporPowerPotion.NAME: Vapor Poderoso
reliquary:VaporPowerPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Añade una carta de poder aleatoria a tu mano. Cuesta 0 este turno. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporPowerPotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Añade !M! copias de una carta de poder aleatoria a tu mano. Cuestan 0 este turno. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporSkillPotion.NAME: Vapor Brillante
reliquary:VaporSkillPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Añade una carta de habilidad aleatoria a tu mano. Cuesta 0 este turno. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporSkillPotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Añade !M! copias de una carta de habilidad aleatoria a tu mano. Cuestan 0 este turno. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporSmokeBomb.NAME: Vapor Oscurecedor
reliquary:VaporSmokeBomb.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Gasta !M! de Oro para escapar de un combate que no sea contra un jefe. No recibes recompensas. NL Agota.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: No tengo el oro para distraelos!

reliquary:VaporSneckoOil.NAME: Vapor Silbante
reliquary:VaporSneckoOil.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Randomiza el coste de la mitad de las cartas de tu mano, hacia arriba. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporSneckoOil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Randomiza el coste de las cartas de tu mano. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporSpeedPotion.NAME: Vapor fresco
reliquary:VaporSpeedPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Gana !M! Destreza. NL Al final de tu turno, pierde !M! Destreza. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporStancePotion.NAME: Vapor Equilibrado
reliquary:VaporStancePotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Si no estás en una postura, entra en Calma o Cálera aleatoriamente. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporStancePotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Si estas en Calma o Cólera, entra en la otra postura. NL Agota.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: No puedo hacerlo mientras estoy en una postura.
Debo estar en Calma o en Cólera para hacerlo.

reliquary:VaporSwiftPotion.NAME: Vapor rápido
reliquary:VaporSwiftPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Roba una carta. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporSwiftPotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Roba !M! cartas. NL Agota.

reliquary:VaporUnknownPotion.NAME: Vapor Desconocido
reliquary:VaporUnknownPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL A{ade una carta de Vapor aleatoria a tu mano. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporUnknownPotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Añade !M! cartas de Vapor aleatorias a tu mano. NL Agota.
reliquary:VaporUnknownPotion.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This Vapor is generated by potions from other mods.

reliquary:VaporWeakPotion.NAME: Vapor Enfermizo
reliquary:VaporWeakPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retiene. NL Aplica !M! Débil. NL Agota.

reliquary:Vim.NAME: Empuje
reliquary:Vim.DESCRIPTION: Gana [E] al inicio de tu turno.
reliquary:Vim.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gana [E] [E] al inicio de tu turno.
